posts.post_content:
Selling my T213 type 3 Al Bridwell. Graded PSA 2.  Asking[strike] $300[/strike][strike]$265[/strike]sold .  I accept   PayPal friends and family or regular.  Price is net to me, so please add  3%  for regular  PayPal.   Shipping is on me for orders over $100, otherwise please add $3.00.  Scans available on   request.

Only two graded by SGC, three by PSA.  Tough card from a cool type.

Adding the following cards:

[strike]T213-2 Bresnahan, Chicago, PSA 3- $200[/strike] sold

PM, or e-mail with questions, a firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing  negotiations.  Thanks for looking.
Bump for new cards and price change.
